abstract.t: This document defines the [LDAPV3] schema descriptions and non- standard syntaxes used by Novell Directory Services (referred to here as NDS). The ObjectClassDescription, AttributeTypeDescription, SyntaxDescriptionm and syntaxes defined in this document are unique to NDS and are meant to compliment those defined in [RFC2252], [RFC2256] and other RFCs and Internet Drafts.
